select distinct c.id company_id,c.title company_name,
date_format(#{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m') time,
arm.city region_id,r.name region_name,count(*) restaurants_num from quancheng_db.16860_client c left join quancheng_db.16860_restaurant_client rc on c.id=rc.client_id left join quancheng_db.api_restaurants ar on ar.id=rc.restaurant_id inner join quancheng_db.api_restaurants_master arm on arm.id=ar.gonghai_id inner join quancheng_db.16860_region r on r.id=arm.city and r.id in (select city_id from quancheng_db.16860_client_region cr where cr.client_id=c.id and cr.status=1 and cr.business="syt") where rc.deleted_at is null and ar.status=0 and ar.created_at <= #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by c.id,r.name

select b.companyId,b.companyName,
#{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} time,
b.reason,sum(b.shelfNum) shelfNum from ( select a.companyId,a.companyName, case when a.reason in ("人均超出300元餐标","外送菜单不符合要求","提供娱乐设施","证件不齐","发票不规范","有过违规记录") then "合规风险" when a.reason in ("合同到期不再续约","合同期内无订单或订单量较少") then "合同到期/订单少" when a.reason in ("内部系统或财务调整") then "内部系统或财务调整" when a.reason in ("服务质量问题") then "服务质量问题" -- when a.reason in ("歇业倒闭","门店装修","暂时无法开具发票","暂时无法提供机打小票") then '餐厅其他原因' else "餐厅其他原因" end reason, a.shelfNum from (
select distinct c.id companyId,c.title companyName, aar.text reason,count(*) shelfNum from quancheng_db.16860_client c left join quancheng_db.16860_restaurant_client rc on c.id=rc.client_id left join quancheng_db.api_restaurants ar on ar.id=rc.restaurant_id left join quancheng_db.api_apply_recodes aar on aar.pid=ar.id where aar.id in ( select max(aars.id) from quancheng_db.api_apply_recodes aars where aars.status = 1 and aars.table_name = 'restaurant' and aars.type = 2 and aars.pid is not null group by aars.pid ) and rc.deleted_at is null and ar.status=0
and date_format(aar.updated_at,'%Y-%m')=#{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
group by c.id,c.title,aar.text
) a union ( select f.companyId,f.companyName,f.reason,f.shelfNum from ( select distinct c.id companyId,c.title companyName,"合规风险" reason ,0 shelfNum from quancheng_db.16860_client c left join quancheng_db.16860_restaurant_client rc on c.id=rc.client_id left join quancheng_db.api_restaurants ar on ar.id=rc.restaurant_id where rc.deleted_at is null and ar.status=0 union select distinct c.id companyId,c.title companyName,"合同到期/订单少" reason ,0 shelfNum from quancheng_db.16860_client c left join quancheng_db.16860_restaurant_client rc on c.id=rc.client_id left join quancheng_db.api_restaurants ar on ar.id=rc.restaurant_id where rc.deleted_at is null and ar.status=0 union select distinct c.id companyId,c.title companyName,"内部系统或财务调整" reason ,0 shelfNum from quancheng_db.16860_client c left join quancheng_db.16860_restaurant_client rc on c.id=rc.client_id left join quancheng_db.api_restaurants ar on ar.id=rc.restaurant_id where rc.deleted_at is null and ar.status=0 union select distinct c.id companyId,c.title companyName,"服务质量问题" reason ,0 shelfNum from quancheng_db.16860_client c left join quancheng_db.16860_restaurant_client rc on c.id=rc.client_id left join quancheng_db.api_restaurants ar on ar.id=rc.restaurant_id where rc.deleted_at is null and ar.status=0 union select distinct c.id companyId,c.title companyName,"餐厅其他原因" reason ,0 shelfNum from quancheng_db.16860_client c left join quancheng_db.16860_restaurant_client rc on c.id=rc.client_id left join quancheng_db.api_restaurants ar on ar.id=rc.restaurant_id where rc.deleted_at is null and ar.status=0 ) f ) ) b group by b.companyId,b.companyName,b.reason

select b.companyId,b.companyName,b.time,b.sourceType,sum(sourceNum) sourceNum from (
select distinct b.company_id companyId,b.company_name companyName,b.time,b.source_type sourceType,count(*) sourceNum from ( select a.company_id,a.company_name,a.time,a.code,a.source,a.id,a.name,scrp.company_id cid, case when a.company_id=scrp.company_id then a.source when a.company_id!=scrp.company_id and a.company_id!=2 then '其他公司推荐' else '商宴通自行拓展' end source_type from ( select c.id company_id,c.title company_name,
date_format(#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m') time,
#{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} time,
trs.code,trs.code_view source,ar.id,ar.name from quancheng_db.16860_client c left join quancheng_db.16860_restaurant_client rc on c.id=rc.client_id left join quancheng_db.api_restaurants ar on ar.id=rc.restaurant_id left join quancheng_db.api_restaurant_master_sources arms on ar.id=arms.restaurant_id and arms.id in( select min(id) from quancheng_db.api_restaurant_master_sources group by restaurant_id ) inner join tmp_restaurant_sources trs on trs.code=arms.type where rc.deleted_at is null and ar.status=0
and date_format(ar.created_at,'%Y-%m')=#{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ar.created_at <= #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ar.created_at >= #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) a left join sj_company_restaurant_sources_map scrp on scrp.sources_code=a.code order by a.company_id ) b group by b.company_id,b.time,b.source_type
union ( select b.company_id,b.company_name,
date_format(#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m') time,
#{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} time,
b.sourceType,b.sourceNum from (select distinct a.company_id,a.company_name, case when a.company_id=scrp.company_id then concat(scrp.company_name,"推荐") else '' end sourceType ,0 sourceNum from ( select c.id company_id,c.title company_name, trs.code,trs.code_view source from quancheng_db.16860_client c left join quancheng_db.16860_restaurant_client rc on c.id=rc.client_id left join quancheng_db.api_restaurants ar on ar.id=rc.restaurant_id left join quancheng_db.api_restaurant_master_sources arms on ar.id=arms.restaurant_id inner join tmp_restaurant_sources trs on trs.code=arms.type ) a left join sj_company_restaurant_sources_map scrp on scrp.sources_code=a.code union select distinct c.id company_id,c.title company_name, trs.code_view sourceType,trs.num sourceNum from 16860_client c left join quancheng_db.16860_restaurant_client rc on c.id=rc.client_id left join quancheng_db.api_restaurants ar on ar.id=rc.restaurant_id left join quancheng_db.api_restaurant_master_sources arms on ar.id=arms.restaurant_id inner join ( select code,'其他公司推荐' as code_view,0 as num from tmp_restaurant_sources union select code,'商宴通自行拓展' as code_view,0 as num from tmp_restaurant_sources ) trs on trs.code=arms.type ) b where b.sourceType !='' ) ) b group by b.companyId ,b.companyName,b.time,b.sourceType
